Clearing Cache

Tina4 is heavily cached and this leads to blazingly fast loading times.

Turn On Debug if you're Developing to disable cache 

  TINA4_DEBUG=true

To Clear Cache visit your project's page i.e. http://localhost:8282/cache/clear

If you're running Tina4 on your machine start it with: 

  php -S localhost:8282 index.php
